sentence_zh_TW: 在這部電影中，主要角色的發展增強了故事的深度和情感共鳴。
sentence: In this movie, the development of the main ______ enhances the depth and emotional resonance of the story.

sentence_zh_TW: 通過勤奮的工作和明智的投資，人們可以賺取穩定的收入，提升生活品質。
sentence: By working diligently and making wise investments, people can ______ a steady income and improve their quality of life.

sentence_zh_TW: 在現代社會中，科技的發展對人們的生活方式與價值觀產生了深遠的影響。
sentence: In modern ______, the development of technology has a profound impact on people's lifestyles and values.

sentence_zh_TW: 當孩子們長大後，培養他們獨立的能力是父母最重要的任務之一。
sentence: As children grow up, fostering their ______ abilities is one of the most important tasks for parents.

sentence_zh_TW: 保持每日的運動習慣能提升身心健康，幫助人們應對壓力。
sentence: Maintaining a ______ exercise routine can improve physical and mental health, helping people cope with stress.

sentence_zh_TW: 這種梨子的多汁和甜美使其成為秋天受歡迎的水果之一。
sentence: The juiciness and sweetness of this ______ make it one of the most popular fruits in the autumn.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個動物園裡有各種各樣的繽紛動物，是家庭和孩子們的熱門遊玩地點。
sentence: This ______ has a variety of colorful animals, making it a popular destination for families and children.

sentence_zh_TW: 這次發現對科學界產生了重大的影響，改變了我們對宇宙的理解。
sentence: This ______ has had a significant impact on the scientific community, changing our understanding of the universe.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個公寓的陽台上，居民們可以享受城市的美麗景觀和新鮮空氣。
sentence: On the ______ of this apartment, residents can enjoy beautiful views of the city and fresh air.

sentence_zh_TW: 在學校的大廳裡，學生們總是聚集在一起，分享他們的經歷和故事。
sentence: In the school ______, students always gather together to share their experiences and stories.

sentence_zh_TW: 許多傳統文化中，狩獵是家庭維持生計的一部分，影響著社會結構。
sentence: In many traditional cultures, ______ plays a role in sustaining families' livelihoods and influences social structure.

sentence_zh_TW: 在完成任務後，宇航員們滿懷期待地返回地球，重返他們的家園。
sentence: After completing their mission, the astronauts eagerly ______ to Earth, returning to their homeland.

sentence_zh_TW: 這部恐怖電影的驚嚇場景讓觀眾緊張得手心冒汗，無法自拔。
sentence: The scary scenes in this horror movie make the audience's palms sweat with ______, leaving them captivated.

sentence_zh_TW: 這款產品的超級性能果然不負眾望，讓使用者的生活變得更加便利。
sentence: The ______ performance of this product truly lives up to its promise, making users' lives more convenient.

sentence_zh_TW: 每到星期一，我們就開始新的工作週，計劃一整星期的工作活動。
sentence: Every Monday, we begin a new work ______, planning our activities for the entire week.

sentence_zh_TW: 個性多樣的人讓社交活動充滿趣味，使每個聚會都充滿活力。
sentence: People with diverse ______ make social gatherings enjoyable, filling each party with vibrancy.

sentence_zh_TW: 作為一名作家，能夠清晰而有力地寫出故事是其職業生涯的重要部分。
sentence: As a writer, being able to clearly and powerfully ______ stories is a crucial part of their career.

sentence_zh_TW: 她用眉筆畫出清晰的眉毛，增強了整體妝容的美感。
sentence: She uses an eyebrow pencil to draw clear ______, enhancing the beauty of her overall makeup.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這次會談中，每個人都被鼓勵分享自己的意見，以促進更深入的討論。
sentence: During the discussion, everyone is encouraged to share their ______ to foster deeper conversations.

sentence_zh_TW: 許多人喜歡在薯條上加番茄醬，來增添口感和風味的層次。
sentence: Many people enjoy adding ______ on their fries to enhance the texture and flavor of the dish.
